txt.en: 'It is a worthwhile trade! I am glad you agree. This is all I have though. Perhaps I will acquire more Motes soon!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will remove 100 Silver Coins of Gundabad.</rgb>
The Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold have a small quantity of Motes available.
Silver Coins of Gundabad for Motes
'If you are looking for Motes, I have just a few. I would be willing to part with them if you have some Silver Coins of Gundabad.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly.</rgb>
Collect 100 Silver Coins of Gundabad to trade with the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold Quartermaster.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly.</rgb>
Talk to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold Quartermaster to trade Silver Coins of Gundabad for Motes.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly.</rgb>
Deliver the Silver Coins of Gundabad to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold Quartermaster
